doc:
Krista Errickson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Krista_Errickson 0 Krista Anne Errickson (born May 8, 1964) is an American actress, journalist, and documentary filmmaker, writer and producer who appeared in films and television productions in the 1980s and 1990s. As a teen actress, she is most recognized for her role as teen antagonist Cinder in the 1980 movie Little Darlings and the TV series Hello Larry. As an adult, she is best known for her work as a journalist with RAI (RadioTelevisioneItaliana). Krista_Anne_Errickson ( born May_8_,_1964 ) is an_American_actress , journalist , and documentary_filmmaker , writer_and_producer who appeared in films_and_television_productions in the_1980s_and_1990s . As a_teen_actress , she is_most_recognized for her_role as teen_antagonist_Cinder in the_1980_movie_Little_Darlings and the_TV_series_Hello_Larry . As an_adult , she is_best_known for her_work as a_journalist with RAI_(_RadioTelevisioneItaliana_) .
